text: Clothilde de Bernardi (born 16 November 1994) is a French inactive tennis player. De Bernardi has a career-high singles ranking of world No. 276, achieved on 8 June 2015. On 18 August 2014, she peaked at No. 436 in the WTA doubles rankings. She has won eleven singles and three doubles titles on the ITF Women's Circuit. In May 2015, she received a wild card to play in the French Open doubles tournament with partner Shérazad Reix. She also received a wild-card entry into the mixed doubles with partner Maxime Hamou. ==ITF finals== ===Singles (11–6)=== {| |-valign=top | {|class=wikitable style="font- size:85%" !
